Reference¶

Core-periphery detection algorithms¶

Algorithms for finding single core-periphery structure

BE([num_runs]) Borgatti Everett algorithm.
MINRES() MINRES algorithm.
SBM() Stochastic block model.
LowRankCore([beta]) LowRankCore algorithm.
LapCore([beta]) LapCore algorithm.
LapSgnCore() LowSgnCore algorithm.
Rombach([num_runs, alpha, beta, algorithm]) Rombach’s algorithm for finding continuous core-periphery structure.
Rossa() Rossa’s algorithm for finding continuous core-periphery structure.

Algorithms for finding multiple core-periphery pairs

Divisive([num_runs]) Divisive algorithm.
KM_ER([num_runs]) Kojaku-Masuda algorithm with the Erdos-Renyi random graph.
KM_config([num_runs]) Kojaku-Masuda algorithm with the configuration model.

Statistical test¶

cpalgorithm.qstest(pair_id, coreness, G, cpa) (q,s)-test for core-periphery structure.
